author: RTÉ News
title: US coronavirus cases surpass both China and Italy
description: The United States has taken the grim title of the country with the most coronavirus infections, as the number of officially recorded cases around the world passed the grim milestone of half a million.
content:
The United States has taken the grim title of the country with the most coronavirus infections, as the number of officially recorded cases around the world passed the grim milestone of half a million.
